Source Pathfinder #71: Rasputin Must Die! pg. 64

Statistics

Cost 1,000 gp Weight 20 lbs.

Damage 2d6 (medium); Critical x4; Range 100 ft.; Type B and P; Special automatic

Misfire 1-2; Capacity 20, 30, or 40

Category Two-Handed; Proficiency Exotic

Description

This imposing machine gun is light enough to be transported and wielded by a single user. Chambered for the Russian military in 7.62 54mmR, this machine gun uses a top-loading, detachable 20-, 30-, or 40-round magazine.

Like most machine guns, it is only capable of automatic fire.
